description: Returns the  RateBasedRule that is specified by the RuleId that you included in the GetRateBasedRule request.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The RuleId of the  RateBasedRule that you want to get. RuleId is returned by  CreateRateBasedRule and by  ListRateBasedRules.

nested_items.name: RuleId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a RateBasedRule. You use RuleId to get more information about a RateBasedRule (see  GetRateBasedRule), update a RateBasedRule (see  UpdateRateBasedRule), insert a RateBasedRule into a WebACL or delete one from a WebACL (see  UpdateWebACL), or delete a RateBasedRule from AWS WAF (see  DeleteRateBasedRule).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A friendly name or description for a RateBasedRule. You can't change the name of a RateBasedRule after you create it.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: A friendly name or description for the metrics for a RateBasedRule. The name can contain only alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), with maximum length 128 and minimum length one. It can't contain whitespace or metric names reserved for AWS WAF, including 'All' and 'Default_Action.' You can't change the name of the metric after you create the RateBasedRule.

nested_items.name: MatchPredicates
nested_items.description: The Predicates object contains one Predicate element for each  ByteMatchSet,  IPSet, or  SqlInjectionMatchSet object that you want to include in a RateBasedRule.

nested_items.name: Negated
nested_items.description: Set Negated to False if you want AWS WAF to allow, block, or count requests based on the settings in the specified  ByteMatchSet,  IPSet,  SqlInjectionMatchSet,  XssMatchSet,  RegexMatchSet,  GeoMatchSet, or  SizeConstraintSet. For example, if an IPSet includes the IP address 192.0.2.44, AWS WAF will allow or block requests based on that IP address.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of predicate in a Rule, such as ByteMatch or IPSet.

nested_items.name: DataId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a predicate in a Rule, such as ByteMatchSetId or IPSetId. The ID is returned by the corresponding Create or List command.

nested_items.name: RateKey
nested_items.description: The field that AWS WAF uses to determine if requests are likely arriving from single source and thus subject to rate monitoring. The only valid value for RateKey is IP. IP indicates that requests arriving from the same IP address are subject to the RateLimit that is specified in the RateBasedRule.

nested_items.name: RateLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of requests, which have an identical value in the field specified by the RateKey, allowed in a five-minute period. If the number of requests exceeds the RateLimit and the other predicates specified in the rule are also met, AWS WAF triggers the action that is specified for this rule.
